title: Bus and train ticket booking
content:
# RedBus App Guide

## Navigation
- **Bottom Navigation Bar**: Switch between **Home**, **Bookings** (your trips), **Offers** (deals), **Help**, and **My Account**.
- **Service Tabs**: Toggle between **Bus Tickets**, **Train Tickets** (redRail), **Hotels**, and **Metro Tickets** at the top of the Home screen.
- **Language**: Tap **"हिंदी में बदलें"** (Change to Hindi) at the top right to switch the app language.

## Search
- **Bus Search**: Enter **From**, **To**, and **Date of Journey**, then tap the red **Search buses** button.
- **Train Search**: Switch to the **Train Tickets** tab, enter stations (e.g., "Patna" to "Lucknow"), select a date, and tap **Search trains**.
- **Result Filters**: On search result pages, use the top bar to filter by **Quota** (General/Tatkal), **Available**, or **AC** class.

## Common Actions
- **Women's Booking**: Toggle the **"Booking for women"** switch on the Bus search screen to find buses with specific safety features or women-only seats.
- **Check PNR**: On the Train tab, tap the **Check PNR status** button to track your ticket status.
- **Live Status**: Tap **Live train status** to see the real-time location of your train.
- **Free Cancellation**: Enable the **"Opt for Free Cancellation"** toggle during search or booking to get a full refund if you cancel later.

## Tips
- **Flash Sales**: Look for banners like **"FLASH SALE 2 PM - 6 PM"** on the Train tab for time-sensitive discounts.
- **Metro Tickets**: You can book metro tickets directly via the **Metro Tickets** tab at the top right.
- **Contact Info**: When booking, you will need to provide your **Email** and **Mobile number** to receive ticket details.
